about_the_game:
🐾 Meet Mousse, The Heroic Cat

Mousse would rather nap the day away, but when the mice decide to hunt the cat, he must defend his home. Using his four quick paws and quicker thinking, Mousse has the cunning and charm to beat back the waves.

🏰 Build Your Feline Fortress

Whittle down the many ranks of the rodent army, not with your claws, but your feline engineering. Scamper around the yard to build layers of traps and weapons to mount a brilliant cat tower defense.

🐭 Outsmart the Mice Army

The Mice Army has more than just numbers to threaten the cozy cat’s home.
From flight to bombs to magic, the invaders have the resources and tenacity to keep Mousse on his toes. Maybe he took their cheese?

🌟 Embrace the Fun

Bursting with creativity and color, Feline Fortress’ cat and mouse game is both challenging and fun. Come join Mousse on the lively last line of defense!
detailed_description:
🐾 Meet Mousse, The Heroic Cat

Mousse would rather nap the day away, but when the mice decide to hunt the cat, he must defend his home. Using his four quick paws and quicker thinking, Mousse has the cunning and charm to beat back the waves.

🏰 Build Your Feline Fortress

Whittle down the many ranks of the rodent army, not with your claws, but your feline engineering. Scamper around the yard to build layers of traps and weapons to mount a brilliant cat tower defense.

🐭 Outsmart the Mice Army

The Mice Army has more than just numbers to threaten the cozy cat’s home.
From flight to bombs to magic, the invaders have the resources and tenacity to keep Mousse on his toes. Maybe he took their cheese?

🌟 Embrace the Fun

Bursting with creativity and color, Feline Fortress’ cat and mouse game is both challenging and fun. Come join Mousse on the lively last line of defense!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.13
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better (64 bit)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Mac compatible

name: Feline Fortress

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better (x86-64)
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

short_description: Join Mousse the cat in this action-packed tower defense game! Pounce on the incoming mouse invasion alongside re-engineered cat post towers and yarn ball cat-a-pults. As enemy waves pour in from land and air, use Mousse’s quick agility and feline intelligence to show them who truly rules, paws down!
